${ModID}:InduceCurrentPower.NAME: Induce Current
DESCRIPTIONS: When you #yMagnetize a card, deal #b%d damage to a random enemy.

${ModID}:RepulsionFieldPower.NAME: Repulsion Field
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a #yMagnetized card is #yExhausted or discarded, gain #b%d Block.

${ModID}:SuperconductancePower.NAME: Superconductance
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yMagnetize a card this turn, reduce its cost by #b%d this turn until played.
